itunes:title: #128 - Pinterest for Your Brand with Natalie Hughes
title: #128 - Pinterest for Your Brand with Natalie Hughes
description:
We all know social media is important for your business, but how can you really leverage it to work for you? We've got Natalie Hughes of The Fashion Digital sharing her social media secrets—specifically around building a Pinterest presence that drives traffic and can help you make money. Sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub
